comment: Version of ~ dtrucor2 with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 (nor ~ ax-4 , ~ ax-5 , ~ ax-7 , ~ ax-12 ). (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jul-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
